select distinct t1.buyid, (select dcodename from sy_ccodedtl where ccode = '014' and dcode = t1.buygubun) as buygubun, t1.ownername, t1.ownerjuminid, t1.address, t1.buym2, t1.regdate as regdate1, t1.buyamt from mm_buymst t1, (select buyid from sa_salemst where 1=1 and SALEID in (select SALEID from sa_saledtl a where 1=1
and substring(DATE_FORMAT(a.regdate, '%Y%m%d'), 1,6) = #S_BUYYEAR#
)) t2 where 1=1 and t1.buyid = t2.buyid and regyn = 'Y'
AND t1.citycode = #S_CITYCODE#
AND t1.boroughcode = #S_BOROUGHCODE#
AND t1.address LIKE '%$S_ADDRESS$%'
order by t1.citycode, t1.boroughcode

select a.sellseq, a.conname, a.conjuminid, a.conm2, a.regdate2, a.saleamt, a.remnm2, (a.remnm2 * (a.buym2 / a.buyamt)) as remnamt from ( select (SELECT KNAME FROM hr_insamst WHERE INSACODE = SALERCD) AS sellseq, t1.conname, t1.conjuminid, t1.conm2, ifnull(t2.regdate, "") as regdate2, t2.sellamt as saleamt, ((select buym2 from mm_buymst where buyid = #BUYID#) - (select sum(conm2) from sa_salemst where buyid = #BUYID#)) as remnm2, (select buym2 from mm_buymst where buyid = #BUYID#) as buym2, (select buyamt from mm_buymst where buyid = #BUYID#) as buyamt from sa_salemst t1, sa_saledtl t2 where 1=1 and t2.regyn = 'Y' and t1.buyid = #BUYID# and t1.saleid = t2.saleid order by saledate ) a where 1=1 and a.regdate2 <> ""
